edu.rpi.phil.legup
Class PuzzleRule

java.lang.Object
  edu.rpi.phil.legup.PuzzleRule
public class PuzzleRule
extends java.lang.Object

Handles functionality for a Puzzle Rule. This is a generic rule that should be extended by any puzzle-specific rule.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Drew Housten

public boolean checkRule(BoardState origBoardState,
                         BoardState destBoardState,
                         PuzzleModule puzzleModule)
Checks if the rule was applied correctly between the original board state and the destination board state

Parameters:
origBoardState - The original board state
destBoardState - The destination board state
Returns:
True if the rule was applied correctly, false otherwise
